episodes.title: Losing my mind while god floods the world...
episodes.description:
🌊 Losing My Mind While God Floods the World 🌊
⛵️🌈📜❓⚖️🤔💭⏳🌀🙏📖💡🔍🚨
Join me, Hazel the Heretic, as I dive into one of the Bible’s most troubling stories—the Flood. If this is a literal story, how can god be good? From the trauma of my religious upbringing to my art therapy sessions (yes, I painted the Flood), we’ll break down Genesis 6-8 and explore the morality, science, and symbolism of this story. 

How does a supposedly "good" God justify wiping out the entire world—humans, animals, and all—with a flood? And why does this story still hold so much weight in fundamentalist circles? Let’s question the narrative, dissect the theology, and challenge the notion of blind faith. Which Bible story made you rethink your beliefs?

00:00 god did this...
01:42 poetry vs literalism
02:12 why did you leave?
03:52 others = evil
05:34 god can regret?
06:31 what did the animals do?
07:28 we are animals...
08:21 perfect little noah
09:17 pot calling the kettle violent
10:54 anti-life god
12:17 creation museum and arc experience
16:03 old old man noah
19:18 Library Art Classes
21:01 The Chosen One...
24:01 take a penny, leave a penny
25:22 the animals would go extinct... with only 2 left
26:26 you = evil
27:25 gods emotional blackmail
28:48 Be Skeptical
29:28 Future Plans

🔔 Don’t forget to like, subscribe, and hit the bell for more critical takes on faith, morality, and religion! Plus, stay tuned for exciting future content focused on art and music, where I’ll explore creativity and how we use it to relate to our world. Some videos will still dive into religious themes, so you won’t want to miss it!

episodes.title: When God Becomes Judge, Jury, and Executioner: Ananias and Sapphira’s Shocking Fate
episodes.description:
📖⚖️💰☠️🔥😱😇👻💔🧐🤔💡👏🗣️❤️
Prepare to be captivated by one of the most chilling stories in the Bible! In this episode of "Bible Horror Story," we dive into the tale of Ananias and Sapphira from Acts 5:1-11—a story of deceit, divine judgment, and ultimate consequences. What happens when God plays the roles of judge, jury, and executioner?  

Join me as we explore the shocking fate of this infamous couple and uncover the lessons hidden in this harrowing narrative. Is this story a warning, a moral lesson, or something far more sinister?  

00:00 Is God's Anger ALWAYS Just?!
01:50 Acts 5
02:40 Can You Lie to god?
03:03 Overreacting much
04:20 Why do we let god off the hook?
05:07 You can't kill people for lying...
05:30 can't fix stupid...
05:52 Cognitive Dissonance
06:54 Fear of god... not respect
07:46 serial killer god
08:41 CAT Break :))
09:07 Hate is not murder
09:55 common sense
10:20 god as a deadbeat dad
11:07 unconditional love my ass
11:33 skepticism

Do you think Ananias and Sapphira’s punishment was justified? Have you heard this story before, and how did it affect your beliefs? It's hard for me to see this god as good...

#BibleHorrorStory #AnaniasAndSapphira #Acts5 #ReligiousDeconstruction #Christianity #Exvangelical #ReligiousTrauma #BiblicalStories

episodes.title: Jesus is NOT Perfect!
episodes.description:
🌟Welcome to Episode 4 of Bible Horror Stories!
In this episode, we dive into one of the strangest New Testament stories: Jesus cursing the fig tree (Mark 11:12-14, 20-33). Why would an omnipotent God curse a tree for not bearing fruit out of season—a system He supposedly designed? 🤔 Let's explore what this bizarre tale reveals about divine expectations, morality, and perfection.

💬 Have your own Bible horror story or thoughts about this passage? Drop them in the comments! I'd love to hear from you.

00:00 New Testament Horror Story
01:04 Mark 11:12
01:31 Figs are NOT in Season
03:27 Trying to Be Straight
04:15 Jesus Cleanses the Temple
05:26 Mark 11:20
05:55 Didn't work for me...
06:17 Mark 11:24
06:32 Forgiveness as a Weapon
07:03 Release it with Art :)
08:35 Jesus is NOT perfect

Let’s question, laugh, and grow together. 🌱

episodes.title: Only Truly HOLY Men Sacrifice Their Daughter
episodes.description:
🔥 Why does the Bible keep glorifying child sacrifice? In this video, we’re diving into one of the most disturbing stories in the Bible: Judges 11. We’ll explore the horrifying tale of Jephthah, a man so "holy" he sacrifices his only daughter to keep a rash vow he made to God. 😱

Along the way, we’ll tackle themes of second-class citizenship, the troubling obsession with sacrificing children, and how this story reflects on the value of human life in Christianity. Is it a motif, a recurring theme, or something even darker? Let’s break it all down together!

💬 Got your own Bible horror story? Drop it in the comments below—I’d love to hear about it and maybe even feature it in a future video!

00:00 Bible Horror Story #3
01:46 Judges 11:12
03:37 Judges 11:18
04:46 Judges 11:21
06:29 Varying Perspectives
07:32 Judges 11:29
12:11 lol
14:47 Pastor Says

#BibleHorrorStories #ChildSacrifice #ReligiousTrauma #Judges11 #Jephthah #Deconstruction #HazelTheHeretic

episodes.title: 5 Ways that Christians Stole Christmas!!!
episodes.description:
🎄🎅❄️🕯️🎁🌕🌿🙏😂🤔😈🥂🍷🎶📖
Did Christians really steal Christmas? Spoiler alert: YES! 
From pagan Yule traditions to Roman celebrations, the holiday we know and love has roots far beyond Bethlehem. In this video, we’ll dive into 5 surprising ways Christians rebranded pagan customs and turned them into "Christian traditions."

👉 If you’ve ever heard someone rant about "keeping the Christ in Christmas" or the so-called War on Christmas, this is the video for you! Get ready to learn the wild, not-so-holy history behind your favorite holiday traditions—like Christmas trees, gift-giving, and even Santa Claus. 

📜 Chapters:
0:00 Did Christians really steal Christmas?
1:09 My Grinch Poem
2:10 Keep Christ in Christmas!
04:13 #1 Time of Year
11:10 #2 Decorations
27:49 #3 Celebration Practices
31:54 CAT HALFTIME SHOW :))
33:34 Back to #3 Celebration Practices
36:58 #4 Winter Festival Food and Drink
39:10 #5 Lore and Mythical Beings
47:58 Happy Holidays Conclusion

🌲Grinch Makeup Tutorial by nyforshortt at: www.tiktok.com/@nyforshortt/video/7437955064536304942

✨ Let’s Talk:
How do you celebrate during the winter holidays? Do you have any secular or alternative traditions? Share in the comments below—I’d love to hear from you!

🛑 Don’t forget to LIKE, SUBSCRIBE, and turn on the bell 🔔 for more videos dissecting the weird, funny, and unexpected sides of religion and culture.

😉 Happy Holidays!

episodes.title: Do YOU have Religious Trauma? I do.
episodes.description:
🙏🧠🌍💖🤔💪🌟💔😂✨💬🌱
If you’ve ever experienced fear-based teachings, feelings of unworthiness, or anxiety from growing up in a strict religious environment, you’re not alone! Religious trauma, or Religious Trauma Syndrome (RTS), describes the lasting emotional and psychological effects of harmful religious teachings and practices. In this video, we dive into what religious trauma is, how it shows up in everyday life, and most importantly, how to heal.
Religious trauma isn’t just a personal issue; it affects how we think, trust ourselves, and interact with the world. From childhood indoctrination to the struggle of rebuilding self-worth, this journey is difficult but possible. Let’s laugh and unpack this together.

Join the Conversation!
If you relate to my story, share your experiences in the comments. Together, we can support each other and find healing. Don’t forget to like, subscribe, and hit the notification bell for more videos on deconstructing harmful religious ideologies.

Do YOU have Religious Trauma? I do.
00:00 Introduction
05:01 What is Religious Trauma?
06:13 Fear-Based Teachings
10:22 Rules around Worthiness
13:39 Isolation from the “Outside World"
16:31 Is Religious Trauma EVEN Real?
18:32 Could Religious Trauma Happen in ANY Religion?
22:03 Is Religion Bad?
23:49 Positive Aspects of Religion
28:24 The Dark Side of Religion
33:56 The Bottom Line
35:44 How Do We Heal?
37:33 Step 1: Understanding the Impact of Religious Trauma
39:21 Step 2: Rebuilding Self-Identity
43:13 Step 3: Reclaiming Spirituality (Or Not)
46:35 Step 4: Relearning Healthy Boundaries
49:20 Step 5: Finding Support and Building Community
51:18 Step 6: Embracing Self-Compassion
53:01 Conclusion

#religioustrauma  #rts  #deconstruction  #healingjourney  #traumarecovery  #exvangelical  #religiousabuse  #mentalhealth 

This video is based on personal experiences and research. I am not a mental health professional. Please consult a qualified professional for advice specific to your situation.

“Leaving the Fold: Testimonies of Former Fundamentalists,” by Edward T. Babinski
"Trauma and Recovery," by Judith Herman

episodes.title: Life Surge EXPOSED: The Truth Behind Their $30,000+ Sales Funnel!
episodes.description:
Hey Heretics💰📉✝️🕵️‍♀️🚨💸⚠️🧩📢❗⚡
What seems like a simple $25 Christian business conference quickly spirals into a tangled web of high-ticket courses, subscriptions, and questionable mentorship programs—all in the name of God and money. In this video, I break down the sales funnel behind Life Surge, from the $97 "Impact Courses" to the $30,000 trading programs, uncovering how they lure attendees into making costly financial decisions.

⚡️ Are they really helping Christians succeed, or just exploiting their faith for profit? Join me as I expose the truth about Life Surge, its founder Dr. Joe Johnson, and their questionable tactics.

I'll be dissecting:

- The misleading marketing tactics Life Surge uses to pull you in
- How their "Kingdom Impact" events funnel attendees into more expensive programs
- The dubious business models behind their courses, including TradeWay and Kingdom 320
- Alleged copyright issues and how they try to silence critics

If you've experienced Life Surge or know someone who has, drop your thoughts in the comments below! Let's start a conversation about these predatory practices.

📌 Resources & Links:

Petition to hold Life Surge accountable: https://chng.it/b6S4jygVcg
Life Surge Facebook Complaint Group: https://www.facebook.com/groups/858866429544149

🔔 Don’t forget to like, subscribe, and hit the notification bell for more deep dives into sketchy businesses hiding behind faith. Let’s expose the truth together!

00:00 Introduction and Overview
02:10 Step 1 Lured in by Religious Manipulation
05:51 Step 2 Life Surge to Impact Courses
09:40 Step 3 $$$ + Tradeway + Kingdom 320 
11:04 Dr. Joe... 
16:55 Copyright Issues
17:37 Conclusion

episodes.title: Christian Main Character Syndrome: The Olympics Isn’t About You!
episodes.description:
Hey Heretics ✨🏆🥇👤🎬🌟
Let's dive into the phenomenon that I like to call ✨Christian Main Character Syndrome—a curious tendency some Christians have to see themselves as the center of every story, including the recent Paris Olympics🏅. From misconstruing artistic depictions of Greek gods as personal slights to feeling oppressed by celebrations of cultural diversity, it's clear that many are missing the bigger picture.

Join me, Hazel the Heretic, as we unpack why the Olympics 🏅 is not a personal attack on Christianity, but rather a celebration of global culture. I’ll explore the roots of this misplaced outrage, debunk misconceptions, and highlight the real issues at hand. Let’s discuss how understanding other cultures can help us grow and why seeing ourselves as the main character in every story might not be the healthiest perspective.

Don’t forget to like, comment with your thoughts or any examples of ✨ Christian Main Character Syndrome you’ve seen, and subscribe for more content that challenges and entertains. 

#ChristianMainCharacterSyndrome #parisolympics2024 #ReligiousOutrageExplained #culturalsensitivity  #olympicsopeningceremony  #UnderstandingGreekMythology #ChristianCringe #exchristian #deconstruction #olympicsopeningceremony 

Christian Main Character Syndrome: The Olympics Isn’t About You!

00:23 Personal Introduction
00:56 A little History
02:21 Christianity is the Majority 
02:46 Reality Check
03:52 Christian Main Character Syndrome
06:42 Oppression Olympics
10:52 Not Christian Enough 
13:09 So Special
14:38 What Even is Oppression
15:20 Not the OG
16:54 Oppression 
17:46 The Results
18:24 Conclusion

episodes.title: Life Surge: Christian Conference or SCAM? Red Flags & Religious Manipulation Exposed!
episodes.description:
Hey Heretics 🚩🚩🤑🙏⚠️💰✝️📖🎭🤔💡🔍🚨
Is Life Surge EVEN Christian??? Today, we dive into the promotional content and personal experiences shared by Life Surge, a so-called Christian-based conference. While some attendees have positive feedback, others have raised serious red flags. Is this event truly about faith, or is it a cleverly disguised money-making scam?

In this video, I react to the promos that Life Surge uses to lure people in, as well as some of the testimonials that highlight potential issues with the organization. From questionable practices to the use of religious manipulation, we’ll uncover what’s really happening behind the scenes.

I’m also working on a Part 2 Deep Dive into Life Surge to reveal how I believe that the scam operates and the key figures behind it. Make sure to subscribe and hit the notification bell so you don’t miss it!

00:00 Life Surge Introduction
01:20 Disclaimers 
01:43 Life Surge Promo #1 (common)
02:39 Life Surge Promo #2 (testimonials)
13:15 Life Surge Promo #3 (supposibilty informative..)
31:09 Bonus Content (LIFE SURGE Speakers)
33:50 Life Surge Conclusions

Have you seen any Life Surge promos? What are your thoughts? Did you attend a Life Surge event? How was your experience?
Let’s expose the truth behind these ‘Christian’ conferences. If you like this video, please give it a thumbs up, subscribe for more content, and share your thoughts in the comments below!

Stay skeptical and remember to keep laughing through the apocalypse!

episodes.title: Weaponizing Laws and Suing for Power (Logan Paul & Iilluminaughtii)
episodes.description:
In today's video, we dive deep into the dark side of legal battles where the rich and powerful exploit the legal system to silence their critics. From Logan Paul’s lawsuit against Coffeezilla to Iilluminaughtii's lawsuit against Oz Media and Felix, we’re exploring how lawsuits have become a tool for those with money to suppress the truth and intimidate their opponents.

⚖️ Defense Funds: 
Coffeezilla Defense Drop (available until AUGUST 19TH) : https://coffeezilla.store/
Patreon: https://patreon.com/Coffeezilla
Legal fund for Oz, Felix, and Other Defendants: 
https://gofund.me/b4924df1

🎥 Why You Should Watch:
If you’re interested in the intersection of wealth, power, and justice, this video is for you. We’ll uncover the tactics used by the wealthy to weaponize the law, and discuss how this impacts everyday people like you and me.

📢 Join the Conversation:
Do you think the legal system is being abused by the rich? Who do you believe holds more power—the government or the wealthy? Share your thoughts in the comments, and let's get the discussion going!

🔔 Don’t Miss Out:
Make sure to hit that subscribe button and ring the notification bell so you never miss an upload. If you enjoyed this video, give it a thumbs up and share it with your friends. Let’s expose how the rich are using the law as a weapon.

episodes.title: Christian Main Character Syndrome: The Olympics Isn’t About You!
episodes.description:
In this video, we're diving into the phenomenon I call Christian Main Character Syndrome—a curious tendency some Christians have to see themselves as the center of every story, including the recent Paris Olympics. 🏅 From misconstruing artistic depictions of Greek gods as personal slights to feeling oppressed by celebrations of cultural diversity, it's clear that many are missing the bigger picture.

Join me, Hazel the Heretic, as we unpack why the Olympics is not a personal attack on Christianity, but rather a celebration of global culture. I’ll explore the roots of this misplaced outrage, debunk misconceptions, and highlight the real issues at hand. Let’s discuss how understanding other cultures can help us grow and why seeing ourselves as the main character in every story might not be the healthiest perspective.

Don’t forget to like, comment with your thoughts or any examples of Christian Main Character Syndrome you’ve seen, and subscribe for more content that challenges and entertains. ✨
#ChristianMainCharacterSyndrome #parisolympics2024 #ReligiousOutrageExplained #culturalsensitivity  #olympicsopeningceremony  #UnderstandingGreekMythology #ChristianCringe #exchristian #deconstruction 

Christian Main Character Syndrome: The Olympics Isn’t About You!

06:42 Oppression Olympics

episodes.title: How Evangelicals Manipulate Kids with Fear - The Dark Side of VBS
episodes.description:
Hey everyone!

I've been thinking a lot about the impact of evangelism, especially on kids. I share my personal experiences and talk about the pressure to convert others, especially children. Let's be honest, it's not always pretty. We'll discuss the importance of respecting children's rights, the dangers of religious trauma, and the need for autonomy in faith. I want to open up a conversation about what it means to grow up in a toxic religious environment and how we can create a more supportive space for everyone.

If you've ever felt pressured to evangelize or have experienced religious trauma, I'd love to hear your story. Let's create a community where we can support each other and grow together. 

Don't forget to like, comment, and subscribe for more honest conversations!

#evangelism  #vbs  #youthoutreach  #religion  #christianity  #religioustrauma  #mentalhealth  #childhood  #faith  #respect  #honesty  #community  #spiritualabuse #indoctrination  #autonomy

episodes.title: Metal in EVERY Tampon tested!
episodes.description:
Why Did It Take So Long to Study Women?! 
Toxic Tampons: Uncovering the Medical Industry's Neglect
Ever wondered why we’re just now learning about the toxins in tampons? As women, we've been second-class citizens in the medical industry for way too long. From toxic tampons to the lack of medical research on women’s bodies, it's time we talk about the gender bias in healthcare and why it's still affecting us today.

In this video, I dive into the shocking findings from a recent study by UC Berkeley, which revealed that tampons contain harmful metals like arsenic and lead. We’ll also explore the historical timeline of gender bias in medical research, and why it took so long to include women in clinical trials. Plus, I'll share my personal journey with late autism diagnosis and how gender bias affects even that.

Join me, Hazel the Heretic, as we unpack this toxic industry and fight for better health care for women. Don’t forget to like, comment, and subscribe if you’re ready to tackle these issues head-on and laugh through the apocalypse with me!

Why Did It Take So Long to Study Women?! Metal in EVERY Tampon Tested
0:00 Intro
1:52  Tampons as a source of exposure to metal(loid)s
2:43 Introduction 
4:14 Materials & Methods
5:35 Results
9:58 Discussion
16:25 Gender Bias in Medical Research
17:27 Timeline
26:08 My Autism
29:59 Conclusion

Personal Opinion Disclaimer:
The views and opinions expressed in this video are solely my own and do not necessarily reflect the official policy or position of any other agency, organization, employer, or company. These opinions are based on my personal experiences and research.

Not a Medical Professional Disclaimer:
I am not a licensed medical professional. The information provided in this video is for general informational purposes only and is not intended as medical advice. Always seek the guidance of a qualified healthcare provider with any questions you may have regarding a medical condition or health objectives.

episodes.title: How is the Government STILL Funding This?!?!
episodes.description:
How is this STILL going on?!?! I was naive to work for this company...

In this video, we dive deep into the dark history of Vivant Behavioral Health and their shady prequels from the same founder, John Jay Ripley, known as Youth Services International (YSI) and Sequel Youth and Family Services. From shocking allegations of child abuse and neglect to the disturbing rebranding tactics to avoid accountability, this for-profit foster care company has a lot to answer for. With over $200 million in annual revenue and countless lives affected, it's time to break the silence and demand change! #childabuseawareness  #breakingcodesilence  #juvenilejustice   #fostercare  

⚠️ Trigger Warning: This video discusses child abuse, neglect, assault, and death. Viewer discretion is advised. ⚠️

episodes.title: The Dark Side of Christian Forgiveness

In this video, I'm discussing my experience with how Christian forgiveness can be misused and manipulated. We'll explore how it can affect self-esteem and delve into cases like Brittany Dawn and Josh Duggar (yikes!). 
We'll also explore if forgiveness can have positive aspects, or is it just BS? Let me know your thoughts in the comments below!  #forgiveness manipulation #exfundie #exchristian #abuse #accountability #findingself after religion
